short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin randomly opens a meme to hopefully make you laugh.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin will show you a random meme from my collection. When you enable dark mode the interface will become darker, but be carefull, because so does the sense of humor.
